overview_of_class: We will explore techniques for describing the real world with numbers and for making educated guesses about how the world works by manipulating these numbers. Students will acquire a knowledge of how to execute statistical tests, but more importantly when and why to execute these tests.
name: Statistical Methods in Psychology
class_attributes:
Formal Studies Distro Area

Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Prerequisites apply, see description
subject: PSYCH
